Sets whether character Heads and Accessories should be downloaded as
[`MeshPart`](https://create.roblox.com/docs/reference/engine/classes/MeshPart)s. The "Default" value is the same as "Enabled". If this
feature is enabled, built-in avatars will use [`MeshPart`](https://create.roblox.com/docs/reference/engine/classes/MeshPart)s for the
character's Head and Accessories.
